thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 3 of 62
thread.title: Quy le

author: Quy le
title: Quy le
text:
Tyler was very knowledgeable about the CSS, HTML5, and Google map API.
I had issues loading Google map on my page and at the time my site was not live yet. I spent half a day trying to figure out if it was the CSS issues but no luck this is when I submitted the ticket to Templatemonster. Tyler responded to my ticket within 6 hours and was able to guide me through the process with the right instruction. I have the map loaded locally - I am so glad that I purchased my site through Templatemonster. I would definitely purchase templates from Templatemonster again in the future.
Thanks!
Quy
